dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
M. Welling
dcterms:description: A citation network with the scientific papers as the nodes, and their citation relationships as the edges. Each node is represented by a 1433-dimensional word vector.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: W. L. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A citation network composed of scientific publications on diabetes, represented by tf-idf word vector in a dictionary of unique words. The edges represent the citation relationships of the publications.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: W. Chiang
X. Liu
S. Si
Y. Li
S. Bengio
C. Hsieh
dcterms:description: An image network composed of online images, represented by a 500-dimensional descriptions vector. The edges represent the relationship between images.
dcterms:title: Flicker

dcterms:creator: M. Telgarsky
dcterms:description: A user interaction network composed of posts on the Reddit forum, represented by the time and title vector of the user comment. The edges indicate that the same person comments on two posts.
dcterms:title: Reddit
